title: Whoever made the Bewitching morgana splash art kudos

replies.body: I believe it was Alex Flores who did the splash,  but I am not sure
That is correct. He also did Arcade Ahri and Championship Zed. Such a beast.

Wow all three are amazing Good job!

That zed skin is currently my favourite skin of all time
Arcade Ahri is my favorite piece from him, Bewitching Morgana is a close second
I'd let her put me in a pot.

Awesome splash, indeed.

People have actually complained in game that the model isn't as good as the splash while I was using it, though.

It is a bit............. tiny. Or, it really brings out the unbelievable tininess of Morgana's current models.
